response.original_title: 実録！！ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像１９
response.overview: The 19th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. In "Symbol Tower" this time as well, lovers visit the symbol tower built facing the coast to enjoy the night view and the stars in the night sky. Fear creeps up from under their feet, but the two are unaware of it.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 19
